item.name: images_quality
item.label: Image packing quality
item.help: [Image packing quality]||When jpgs are resized or pngs compressed, they are saved in this quality.||If you want to make {Google Page Insights} happy, set it to 85||Otherwise, when there is no problems with page speed, set this to 95.

item.name: rem_px
item.label: Rem max width px
item.help: {Default rems} layout max 100 rems width.||Leave empty when not set

item.name: rem_ratio
item.label: Rem max ratio
item.help: {Default rems} layout max 100 rems ratio to viewport height.||Leave empty when not set

item.name: rem_m_px
item.label: Rem mobile px
item.help: {Default rems} layout breakpoint for mobile size. Rems are twice as big below this viewport width.||Leave empty when not set

item.name: rem_switched
item.label: Desktop rem switched
item.help: {Rem switched} on desktop sizes use width or height for rem calculation

item.name: rem_k
item.label: Rem divider
item.help: {Rem divider} height of 1 rem to viewport size

item.name: rem_m_k
item.label: Rem mobile divider
item.help: {Rem mobile divider} height of 1 rem to mobile viewport size

item.name: deprecated
item.label: Use deprecated features
item.help: [Use deprecated features]||Switch on some deprecated features to enable backwards compatibility.

item.name: images_no_imageset
item.label: Image as image-set
item.help: [Image as image-set]||Generate background image css as image-set for high resolution (retina) screens.||{_ib()} widths and heights have to be given as screen physical pixels.||For non-high resolution images divider 2 is used.
